description: Big performance, small package, this pocket-sized light that pumps out up to 800 lumens, is easy to charge and has 8 modes (5 steady and 3 flashing). Couple the strong feature-set with intuitive 1-button controls and the Micro Drive Pro 800XL becomes a serious contender. The tool-free silicone mount attaches easily to your handle bars and can be swapped between bikes in seconds.8 lighting modes, 5 in steady and 3 in flashing; steady: 800 lumens (1.75h), 400 lumens (4h), 250 lumens (5.5h), 150 lumens (19h), 15 lumens (87h), flash – 150 lumens (19h), pulse – 50 lumens (17h) and day flash – 800 lumens (8.5h).Easy 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes.Race mode (activated by holding the button down for 5 seconds) uses only 2 modes, a high (800 lumens) and a low (150 lumens). Race mode lets you cycle between the high and low mode with a single button press, low mode is great for when your riding in a pack, high mode is good for when you’re in the lead.Mode memory remembers what mode the light was in when it was shut off.Cut-outs at the lens provide side illumination, keeping you seen from the side.Easy USB charging via micro-USB takes only ~4 hours.LED charging indicator lets you know light needs charging, when it’s charging and when it’s ready to go.Rugged aluminum body with integrated cooling fins dissipates heat well.Silicone mounting strap mounts on your bars without tools.IPX7 waterproofing protects your light from even the heaviest downpours.
name: Lezyne Micro Drive Pro 800XL Light
